snippet: “Can’t Anybody Here Play This Game?” and nine other books by Jimmy Breslin have been released as e-books by Open Road Media in time for the Mets to celebrate their 50th anniversary.
abstract: Jimmy Breslin's book Can’t Anybody Here Play This Game?, chronicling the 1962 New York Mets, and nine other books by the writer have been released as e-books by Open Road Media in time for the Mets to celebrate their 50th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: “Can’t Anybody Here Play This Game?” and nine other books by Jimmy Breslin have been released as e-books by Open Road Media in time for the Mets to celebrate their 50th anniversary.

headline.seo: Breslin, Chronicler of ’62 Mets, Recalls Their Appeal
